By Nate Railsback on Thursday, October 11, 2001 - 07:54 pm:

I found a "Lifecargo" or somesuch on beginning-of-the-season searches, and got the "Life Secrets" trait, which "Significantly increases the damage from Life attacks." That would be great...if only I knew something that HAD Life attacks. Does anyone know who would qualify? Or is it a sort of language error and they mean healing moves like Pixie's? If not for the word "damage" in there, that's what I'd believe.

By Nate Railsback on Thursday, October 11, 2001 - 09:34 pm:

By Nate Railsback on Friday, October 12, 2001 - 01:13 pm:

It only has about 150 Intelligence, but it got Wind Wisdom (started with) and Life Secrets (learned) from the Pixie/Morx who gave her Heart to him. She had only about 200 Intelligence*, and all of these were found in the back area of Morx, one in the field, one in the tall grass.

*Yep, I raised a Pow-based Pixie. End stats had Life around 250, Power around 450, Intelligence at around 200, Speed around 650, and Defense about 200. She only ever knew Somersault and Wind Lance, and never needed much more (I just wish that Wind Wisdom would have affected Wind Lance).

By danz on Friday, October 12, 2001 - 06:21 pm:

back area with tall grass? where and how do you get to it?

By Nate Railsback on Saturday, October 13, 2001 - 02:43 pm:

The stuff on the sides of the area. There's Earth Light in the mushrooms and in the "reed" looking things.
